main_points: When purchasing a pack of 10 items, it will be recorded as one unit on the invoice, but you need to ensure that you show it as 10 units.
Invoices must be uploaded within 180 days, and you can upload a photo of the invoice if it comes with the package.
To submit an invoice, you need to provide your email and agree to the terms.
For category approval, you can purchase any product from that category, not just the specific DAO program.
For easier approval, it's recommended to buy the DAO product itself if it is restricted in the category, as it will help in getting approved for both the category and the brand.
Approval for selling the product typically occurs within 72 hours.

insights.process_efficiency: The process of submitting invoices and getting approvals is streamlined, but attention must be paid to the details of the purchase and submission.
insights.strategic_purchasing: Choosing the right products for approval can simplify the process, especially when dealing with restricted categories.
insights.timeliness: Submitting invoices promptly within the specified timeframe is crucial for maintaining compliance and ensuring quick approvals.
